text: Pittsfield is a city in Massachusetts, United States. It is the largest city and the county seat of Berkshire County. It is the main city of the Pittsfield Metropolitan Statistical Area which includes all of Berkshire County. The population was 43,927 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:County seats in Massachusetts Category:Cities in Massachusetts Category:Berkshire County, Massachusetts
title: Pittsfield, Massachusetts
